Surdo.title: Deaf
Surdo.desc:
Enables captions, visual feedback
and real-time text features (STT).

Cego.title: Blind
Cego.desc: Enables screen reader, voice feedback (TTS), larger text sizes and high contrast.

Mudo.title: Mute
Mudo.desc:
Enables quick communication with predefined phrases,
text-to-speech and shortcuts.

Outros.title: Others
Outros.desc: Accesses all features in the standard way.

about.title: About VoxLink
about.desc: VoxLink is an inclusive platform that connects users with different needs to accessible interfaces.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.desc: Theme, text, haptic feedback and more to improve usability for all users.

faq1.q: How can I change the text size?
faq1.a: Go to Settings > Text Size and select your preference.

faq2.q: Does the app support voice commands?
faq2.a: Yes, you can enable it in Settings > Voice Commands.

faq3.q: How do I change the app language?
faq3.a: In Settings, tap Language and choose your preferred language.
